title: Launcher Closes at Logo Every Time I Launch LoL
body: Whenever i launch league it closes at the logo and i cant get to the launcher. I think its becausee im missing the RIOT games File anyone know how to get it back? Plus whenever i try to install the game again it just keeps repeating the whole thing. please help!

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you try the following (one at a time) and let me know if anything helps.

* Try running as an admin by right clicking on the executable and selecting "Run As" and "Administrator", or by using the lol.admin.launcher.exe


* Delete everything inside the your RADS downloads folder (Default Path is, C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\downloads) AND
  * Delete everything inside your RADS solutions folder ( Default Path is, C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\solutions)
  * Restart your computer and repatch


* Delete the lol_air_client folder in your RADS projects folder (Default Path is, C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\projects) AND
  * Delete the lol_air_client_config_oc1 and the lol_launcher folders inside the RADS projects folder.
  * Restart your computer and repatch


* Go to your Riot Games projects folder and open the folder with the number for the latest release (Default path is C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\projects\lol_air_client\releases\0.0. 0.###) Find the folder with the highest number.
  * Delete the following files:
    * releasemanifest
    * S_OK
* Then open the Deploy folder
  * Delete the following folders/files:
    * lib (folder)
    * ETA-INF (folder)
    * mod (folder)
    * lolclient.exe (file)
    * lolclnt.swf (file)
    * locale.properties (file)
* Restart your LoL application and allow it to repatch
